scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o public/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss -o public/css/overrides.min.css public/css/overrides.css && cleancss -o public/css/styles.min.css public/css/styles.css
scripts.minify:public: terser public/js/gsap.min.js -c -m -o public/js/gsap.min.js && terser public/js/bootstrap.min.js -c -m -o public/js/bootstrap.min.js && terser public/js/ScrollTrigger.min.js -c -m -o public/js/ScrollTrigger.min.js && terser public/js/lazysize.min.js -c -m -o public/js/lazysize.min.js && terser public/js/ScrollSmooth.js -c -m -o public/js/ScrollSmooth.js
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:public && next build
